pullRequest.title: [nanoleaf] reduce layout logs, fix wrong type detection, add discovery props
pullRequest.bodyText:
Reduce layout logging by manual triggering
Add more test for inconsistent layout response from device
Fix wrong type detection for canvas
Fix rediscovery end handling (could have put controller offline)
Add model/vendor properties automatically if things configured manually in a static things file
Some code cleanup

Signed-off-by: Stefan Höhn stefan@andreaundstefanhoehn.de

commit.message:
[nanoleaf] Reduce layout logs, Fix wrong type detection, Add discovery props

- Reduce layout logging by manual triggering
- Add more test for inconsistent layout response from device
- Fix wrong type detection for canvas
- Fix rediscovery end handling (could have put controller offline)
- Add model/vendor properties automatically if things configured manually in a static things file
- Some code cleanup

Signed-off-by: Stefan Höhn <stefan@andreaundstefanhoehn.de>

nodes.bodyText: please remove this logging statement, or set to debug
